title: Djibouti
summary: Djibouti,[lower-alpha 1] officially the Republic of Djibouti, is a country located in the Horn of Africa. It is bordered by Somaliland[lower-alpha 2] in the south, Ethiopia in the southwest, Eritrea in the north, and the Red Sea and the Gulf of Aden in the east. Across the Gulf of Aden is Yemen. The country has a total area of 23,200 km2 (8,958 sq mi).[1]
